flowRoot.flowPara: Stores create wildcards for you, so build them whenever possible â€“ preferably in wards with lots of cards.

flowRoot.flowPara: Action: Move Kaiju into a neighboring location, scaring all customers in that location into a neighboring location. All customers must go to same location.

flowRoot.flowPara: Expansion for Shinjuku
